verbs.description: at [V: swearing] in sheehan promises profound changes in albany mayor kathy sheehan took the oath of office monday beginning her second term with a promise to focus attention on every neighborhood in the city in the rotunda at city hall sheehan called herself a pragmatist who will work to make every corner of the city a place that is safe where good quality housing is available where residents have access to good jobs and children have access to a great education albany mayor kathy sheehan sheehan
